title: How do weekly auditions work in K-pop? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is no weekly based audition. But there are a lot of audition chances you can get monthly. You can get the informations through internet(each companies' homepages, relative community sites) if you are abroad not in Korea. As i said ahead, there are many auditions. But the applicants are more than that. Each applicant get 3mininutes to appeal themselves to judges on average.

There’s a truck or something that comes around and you audition there or you go to the audition address place and do what people do on a audition. You know what how about you watch it’s way easier that way.
